tabs.descriptionOverride: See exactly what users experienced on your app, as well as DOM playback, console and network logs, errors, and performance data

feature.title: Session Replay
feature.description: Pixel-perfect user sessions, event timeline, session search and filtering

tabs.descriptionOverride: Build conversion funnels, path analysis, and timeseries trends to understand user behavior. Then drill in with session replays to understand individual behavior.

feature.title: Product Analytics
feature.description: Start with a business question and zoom into session replays for validation, or start from a session and see how the same behaviors play out across your app.

tabs.descriptionOverride: Galileo AI proactively surfaces the high-impact technical and UX issues that are impacting conversion and retention

feature.title: AI Issues
feature.description: Galileo AI proactively surfaces the high-impact areas causing user struggle. Funnel insights identifies the sources of drop off at every step in key workflows.

tabs.descriptionOverride: Galileo AI separates signal from noise so you can proactively identify, triage, and resolve the most impactful user issues.

feature.title: AI Error Tracking
feature.description: Galileo AI separates signal from noise so you can proactively identify, triage, and resolve the most impactful user issues.

tabs.descriptionOverride: Use heatmaps, clickmaps, and scrollmaps to understand user behavior on your most important pages and screens.

feature.title: UX Analytics
feature.description: Combine qualitative and quantitative insights and make data-driven design decisions with heatmaps, clickmaps, scrollmaps, and more.

children.text: Your customers are suffering in silence.
LogRocket surfaces the UX and technical issues impacting conversion & retention.
Solutions
One platform that helps you optimize conversion, drive adoption, and ensure issue-free experiences.
Surface the most impactful issues blocking user success with Galileo AI
Answer questions and measure success without code changes through autocapture and self-serve product analytics
Watch replays of user behavior to understand the "why"
Optimize conversion and adoption
Proactively identify where users get stuck in your app and immediately find high-impact issues
Galileo AI watches sessions for you and identifies priorities in natural language
Get alerted when new issues arise so you can spend time solving problems, not searching for them
Surface user struggle
Understand the context behind every user-reported issue with pixel-perfect session replay
Look under the hood to diagnose root cause with in-depth technical telemetry
Integrate with top service solutions to understand tickets without interrupting workflows
Solve user-reported issues
Convert, engage and retain customers.
Product Analytics
Surface the most impactful issues affecting your users.
Struggle Detection
Reproduce every user experience with pixel-perfect replays across web and mobile.
Session Replay
Visualize how users experience your app at both the individual and aggregate level.
User Experience Analytics
Correlate frontend performance with business impact.
Frontend Performance Monitoring
Galileo watches every session to identify patterns in user behavior.
Galileo AI
Features
Works with your stack.

LogRocket works regardless of language or framework, and we 
provide SDKs for specific technologies.

Integrate LogRocket into your tech stack for a comprehensive view
of your user experience across web and mobile apps

Galileo AI allows Common App to proactively identify the highest-impact issues and their causes. It saves us countless hours and gives us the confidence to know we're choosing the right issues to solve.

LogRocket Galileo gives us the confidence to know that were fixing the issues that will lead to the greatest improvement in UX, and frees our teams up to spend more time designing and building features that our users will love.
